device_mount: Handheld; Placed loosely around user (e.g., table)
use_cases_desc: Develop, test, and perform cross-device wearable and mobile behaviors
evaluation: User study (qualitative); User study (quantitative, controlled lab experiment)
contribution_desc: A high-level scripting development framework and environment for developing cross-device wearable and mobile interaction.
interaction_techniques: Data transfer/sharing; Conduit gestures; Remote control; UI distribution
toolkits: Javascript; HTML5; academic toolkits; Weave; NodeJS
device_models: Nexus, Andoird Wear, Samsung Gear Live, Google Glasses
